definitions.definition: A layer of tissue beneath the epidermis in plants , performing the physiological function of strengthening the epidermal tissue. In phanerogamous plants it is developed as collenchyma .
An inner cellular layer which lies beneath the chitinous cuticle of arthropods , annelids , and some other invertebrates .

main_definition: ( botany ) A layer of tissue beneath the epidermis in plants , performing the physiological function of strengthening the epidermal tissue. In phanerogamous plants it is developed as collenchyma .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) An inner cellular layer which lies beneath the chitinous cuticle of arthropods , annelids , and some other invertebrates .
